Try UXA acceleration method to see if it helps by putting the following line in the Device section of xorg.conf: Option "AccelMethod" "UXA"
Or just change EXA to UXA if that line is already there
This way, you will have DRI2 and gl should work better with compiz (dragging glxgears window around will stay with the window instead of leaving a mess on your screen for example)
